channel.title: Pages on Lorenzo Peppoloni

item.title: About
item.description: About A brief history of my education and experience Education I got a BSc in Engineering Informatics and an MSc in Robotics and Automation from the University of Pisa. After that, I got a PhD in Perceptual Robotics from Scuola Superiore Sant’Anna. The main focus of my PhD was human motion reconstruction from cheap sensors applied to robotic teleoperation and robotic embodiment. In 2015 and later in 2017, I spent some time in LA at USC with Prof.
